dao

Class ShoppingCartDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.ShoppingCartDAO

  • public class ShoppingCartDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    ShoppingCartDAO class contains all the methods that interact with the database relatively to the shopping cart and to the classes that extend it.
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Paolo D'Arienzo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShoppingCartDAO() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addOneItem(java.lang.String userMail, ProductInCart prodotto)
      Adds an item and the number of it to the user's shopping cart in the database
      static void cleanShoppingCart(java.lang.String userMail)
      Cleans the shopping cart of the indicated user in the database
      static void deleteProductFromDatabase(java.lang.String userMail, int productID)
      Removes the product from the shopping cart of the user from database
      static ShoppingCart getShoppingCartFromDatabase(User utente, java.lang.String mailUtente)
      Queries the database in search of the shopping cart of the indicated user
      static void updateInDatabase(java.lang.String userMail, int productID, int newQuantity)
      Updates the shopping cart of the user; it sets a new quantity to the product indicated

    • Method Detail

      • addOneItem

        public static void addOneItem(java.lang.String userMail,
                              ProductInCart prodotto)
                       throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Adds an item and the number of it to the user's shopping cart in the database
        Parameters:
        userMail - id of the owner of the shopping cart
        prodotto - is the product to add to the cart in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs with the connection to the database

      • updateInDatabase

        public static void updateInDatabase(java.lang.String userMail,
                                    int productID,
                                    int newQuantity)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Updates the shopping cart of the user; it sets a new quantity to the product indicated
        Parameters:
        userMail - id of the owner of the shopping cart
        productID - is the ID of the product to update in the cart, in the database
        newQuantity - is the new quantity to set for the product
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs with the connection to the database

      • deleteProductFromDatabase

        public static void deleteProductFromDatabase(java.lang.String userMail,
                                             int productID)
                                      throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Removes the product from the shopping cart of the user from database
        Parameters:
        userMail - is the id of the owner of the shopping cart
        productID - is the ID of the product that have to be removed
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs with the connection to the database

      • cleanShoppingCart

        public static void cleanShoppingCart(java.lang.String userMail)
                              throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Cleans the shopping cart of the indicated user in the database
        Parameters:
        userMail - ID of the owner of the shopping cart
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs with the connection to the database

      • getShoppingCartFromDatabase

        public static ShoppingCart getShoppingCartFromDatabase(User utente,
                                                       java.lang.String mailUtente)
                                                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                       java.net.UnknownHostException
        Queries the database in search of the shopping cart of the indicated user
        Parameters:
        utente - is the user, owner of the shopping cart
        mailUtente - indicates the user from which take the shopping cart
        Returns:
        the shopping cart of the user
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs with the connection to the database
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if an error occurs with the determination of the IP address
